summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6037 for the improvement of 40th Avenue West from Commodore Way to Hooker Street; and certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 81991, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
